REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1556 reute b f BC-LONDON-EXCHANGES---SD 04-07 0050

TEXT.TITLE: LONDON EXCHANGES - SDR CALCULATION
TEXT.BODY: The following information has been advised by the Bank of England to the International Monetary Fund in Washington to enable calculation of the value of the SDR - middle spot rates at noon today. DMK 1.8216 FFR 6.0612 YEN 145.15 STG 1.6198
